response.overview: Adisha, a dedicated postman, finds letters without addresses and keeps them in a special pocket. One day, he discovers a professor who writes letters to his deceased wife. Adisha delivers a letter from his own wife to the professor, who is moved by the gesture. Inspired by a letter written by Nobel Laureate Richard Feynman to his late wife, this film explores themes of love, loss, and connection.
response.title: Sahurda
